wikipedia_page.main: Squadron Leader Hugh Joseph "Huseph" Riddle RAF (24 May 1912 – 16 April 2009) was a World War II Royal Air Force fighter pilot during the Battle of Britain.

response: * Sqn Ldr "Jack" Riddle & Sqn Ldr Hugh Riddle – brothers and last surviving aircrew who flew with 601 Sqn during the Battle of Britain (both died 2009)
